wijayakala owani prakashayak kirimata hethu wu pasubima eyayi.mahajanaya wisin pathkara parlimenthu yawu ape minisun karana dushana wancha thakkadikam, nithiyata koka pennili, dakiddi koti sitiyanam hodayayi apatath nosithenneda, manda esenam mowun naguta deparande gasaganna bawini

oba kiyana deta sampurnayenma ekanga wenawa ara mata ekathu karanna deyak naha ..

ek kuda gasakin gedi wissaka thihaka athara pramanayak neliya haki athara wishala gasakin mita wada wadi pramanayak labagatha haka.shakaye poththa pahasuwen galawi yamath, pathraye narati pihita athi aakarayath, palaye wisheshitha swabhawayath, bijaye athi pulun wani upangayan shaka niwaradiwa handuna ganimata bhawitha kala haki suwisheshi lakshanayak we.wallapatta shakaya pilibandawa warthamana bhawithayan lesa suwanda wilawun nishpadanayata behewin yoda gatha haka.
